alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Ness; Rush; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:26PM CST until January 06 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40-45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Ness, Rush, Ellis and Trego Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
